rules.natural: Whenever the agency regulates the bank, it follows that if the client attends the seminar, then the bank not being profitable implies the client invests in the bond.
Either the agency regulates the bank or the agency audits the bank.
In the case that the agency fines the bank, then whenever the client attends the seminar, a non-profitable bank results in the client investing in the bond.
Assuming the regulator investigates the agency, then if the agency audits the bank, the agency fines the bank.
The regulator investigates the agency or the regulator oversees the agency.
Given that the regulator oversees the agency, then the agency auditing the bank implies the agency fines the bank.
If the bank secures the collateral, then the bank is profitable.
If the bank merges with the competitor, then the bank does not acquire the competitor.
Should the CEO propose the merger, then the board votes on the merger.
Either the CEO proposes the merger or the board opposes the merger.
In the event the board opposes the merger, then if the bank merges with the competitor, the bank acquires the competitor.
Under the condition that the board votes on the merger, then a merger by the bank with the competitor results in the bank acquiring the competitor.
If the bank offers the mortgage, then when the bank is not profitable, the client loses money.

rules.prover9_expression: (appeals(client, decision) | (-(qualifies(client, income) -> offers(bank, mortgage)) -> rejects(bank, client)))
rules.natural: Either the client appeals the decision, or if it is not the case that the client qualifying based on income implies the bank offers the mortgage, then the bank rejects the client.
If the bank violates the rule, then the regulator does not penalize the bank.
The bank violates the rule, or the bank files the report, or the bank is profitable.
The auditor detects the violation or the auditor suspects the violation.
In the case that the auditor suspects the violation, then the bank violating the rule implies the regulator penalizes the bank.
If the auditor reports the violation, then should the bank violate the rule, the regulator penalizes the bank.
Under the condition that the analyst warns the client, then if the bank does not offer the mortgage, the client does not refinance the mortgage.
The analyst warns the client or the analyst advises the client.
Should the analyst advise the client, then the analyst calculates the savings.
Whenever the analyst suggests refinancing, then provided that the bank does not offer the mortgage, the client does not refinance the mortgage.
If the analyst calculates the savings, then the analyst suggests refinancing.
The bank markets the product, or the bank promotes the product, or the bank offers the mortgage.
Given that the client signs the contract, the client buys the product.
Under the condition that the bank submits the application, the bank files the report.
Should the bank receive the approval, then the bank is profitable.
If the bank hires the consultant, then the bank submits the application.
Provided that the bank trains the staff, the bank receives the approval.
In the event the consultant recommends hiring, then either the bank hires the consultant or the bank trains the staff.
The consultant recommends hiring or the consultant suggests training.
If the consultant suggests training, then the bank implements the training.
Whenever the bank implements the training, then the bank hires the consultant or the bank trains the staff.
Provided that the client invests in the bond, the client does not invest in the stock.
Should the client consult the advisor, then the client uses the spreadsheet.
The client consults the advisor or the client attends the seminar.
In the event it is false that the bank approving the loan leads to the bank being profitable, then the broker advises the client.
Under the condition that the bank approving the loan does not imply the bank is profitable, then the client does not use the calculator.
Provided that it is not the case that the bank seizes the asset or the bank secures the collateral, then the bank merges with the competitor.
If the client qualifying based on income does not lead to the bank offering the mortgage, then the bank does not reject the client.
Whenever it is not the case that the broker advising the client implies the client uses the calculator, then the client defaults.
In the case that it is false that the auditor detecting the violation implies the auditor reports the violation, then the auditor ignores the violation.
Assuming it is not the case that the negation of the broker advising the client implying the client uses the calculator leads to the client not defaulting, then the company insures the client.

Under the condition that it is false that the negation of the broker advising the client implying the client uses the calculator implies the client does not default, then the company does not insure the client.
